 \textbf{Script Files}
 \begin{itemize}
 \item Scripts are saved as \texttt{.R} files. 
 \item These scripts can be called directly using the \texttt{source()} command.
 \end{itemize}
 
 \begin{framed}
 \texttt{source(myScript.R)}
 
 \texttt{source(myDatasets.R)}
 
 \texttt{source(myFunctions.R)}
 \end{framed}
